Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Practice for the undergraduate-level courses "Algebra", "Probability and Statistics", and "Analysis" at the Department of Statistics, University of Padova (Italy).
Teaching Assitant for the PhD-level course "Quantitative Methods" at IMT of Lucca (Italy).
Teaching Assitant for the graduate-level course “Mathematical Methods for Economics” at LUISS University, (Rome, Italy).

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relatore a: "12 th Viennese Workshop on Optimal Control, Dynamic Games and Nonlinear Dynamics", Vienna (Austria) Titolo talk: "Stock dynamics with infinite delay: pricing and hedging"
Relatore a: "Stochastic Analysis and Control", Bedlewo (Poland) Titolo talk: "Market models with delay and differentiability with respect to the present state variable of the associated semigroup"

Relatore a: "9th International Conference on "Large-Scale Scientific Computations", Sozopol (Bulgaria) Titolo del talk: "Differentiability of the semigroup associated to SDEs with delay and applications to finance"
Relatore a: "Meeting on path-dependent SDEs and related topics", Pisa (Italy) Titolo talk: "Directional regularity for viscosity solutions of Kolmogorov equations arising in SDEs with delay"
Relatore a: "13 Viennese Workshop on Optimal Control and Dynamic Games", Vienna (Austria) Titolo del talk: "An impulse control approach to irreversible investment with fixed costs"
Relatore a "International Conference on Stochastic Analysis and Applications", Hammamet (Tunisia) Titolo del talk: "Path-dependent equations and viscosity solutions in infinite dimension"
Relatore a "XVIII WORKSHOP ON QUANTITATIVE FINANCE", Milano (Italy) Titolo del talk: "Partial regularity of viscosity solutions for a class of Kolmogorov equations arising from mathematical finance"

Relatore a "International Workshop on BSDEs, SPDEs and their Applications", Edinburgh (Scotland) Titolo del talk: "Representation of path-dependent PDEs in Hilbert spaces: relationship between two notions of viscosity solution"

Relatore a "International Conference on Stochastic Analysis, Stochastic Control, and Applications", Hammamet (Tunisia) Titolo del talk: "Representation of path-dependent PDEs in Hilbert spaces: relationship between two notions of viscosity solution"
Relatore a "III Energy Finance Workshop" (Pescara) Titolo del talk: "Irreversible investment with fixed adjustment costs: a stochastic impulse control approach"

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Member of the project "Equazioni stocastiche con memoria e applicazioni" (financed by INdAM --- Istituto Nazionale di Alta Matematica). Head: Salvatore Federico (University of Siena, Italy).
Member of the project "PDE correlate a sistemi stocastici con ritardo" (financed by INdAM --- Istituto di Nazionale Alta Matematica). Head: Federica Masiero (University of Milano Bicocca, Italy).
